file_results.false_positive_reason: The flagged lines use os.system to execute shell commands, but these commands are only used in the context of a setuptools custom command (PublishCommand) to automate package publishing and GitHub release tasks. The commands (GS_COMMAND and PUBLISH_COMMAND) are statically defined and do not take user input, so there is no risk of arbitrary code execution or command injection. This is a common pattern in Python packaging scripts to automate build and release processes. No evidence of malicious intent or behavior is present in the code.
